abstract: Pixable, a new start-up, lets users create photo albums using photos from Facebook, Flickr and Picasa.
snippet: Pixable, a new start-up, lets users create photo albums using photos from Facebook, Flickr and Picasa.
lead_paragraph: Update | 10/19/09 11:07 a.m. Added further explanation about the difference between Pixable and other photo-book services.

headline.main: Pixable Wants to Get Photo Albums Off the Web
